scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../part3/phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && cd ../../part3/phonebook-backend && cp -f -r ./dist index.js ./models package.json /home/homulily85/phone-book-deploy && cd /home/homulily85/phone-book-deploy && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
